GRID_ACTIONSTRING_ENDLESS_INIT: <?lua --[[@l]] local num,val,min,max,red,gre,blu=self:ind(),self:epva(),self:epmi(),self:epma(),glr(),glg(),glb()--[[@for]] for i=1,5,1 do--[[@l]] local intensity,lednum=gsc(i-1,val,min,max),num+i*2-2--[[@glc]] glc(lednum,1,red,gre,blu,0)--[[@glc]] glc(lednum,2,red,gre,blu,1)--[[@glp]] glp(lednum,1,0)--[[@glp]] glp(lednum,2,intensity)--[[@enl]] end ?>
GRID_ACTIONSTRING_ENDLESS_ENDLESS: <?lua --[[@l]] local num,val,min,max,ch,cc=self:ind(),self:epva(),self:epmi(),self:epma(),(gmy()*4+gpc())%16,(32+gmx()*16+self:ind())%128--[[@gmsh]] gms(ch,176,cc,val//128) gms(ch,176,cc+32,val%128)--[[@for]] for i=1,5,1 do--[[@l]] local intensity,lednum=gsc(i-1,val,min,max),num+i*2-2--[[@glp]] glp(lednum,2,intensity)--[[@enl]] end ?>
GRID_ACTIONSTRING_ENDLESS_BUTTON: <?lua --[[@l]] local num,val,ch,note=self:ind(),self:bva(),(gmy()*4+gpc())%16,(32+gmx()*16+self:ind())%128--[[@gms]] gms(ch,144,note,val)--[[@for]] for i=1,5,1 do--[[@l]] local lednum=num+i*2-2--[[@glp]] glp(lednum,1,val)--[[@enl]] end ?>
